Commands.Wound: 1-HIT BRV attack.  Inflicts Poison and Small Max BRV Down for 2 turns.
Commands.Moonlight: Increases BRV based on Attack then raises it by 1.2 before inflicting an HP attack.  Grants Small Attack Up for 3 turns.
Commands.Advance All: Slightly raises party Max BRV overflow limit for 3 turns  No action delay  Doesn't increase turn count  Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count
Commands.Ultima Arrow: 7-HIT BRV+HP attack.  Deals 30% HP damage to other enemies.  Deals more HP damage to other enemies if target is broken or gets broken.  Inflicts Light of the Goddess to all enemies for 5 turns.  Light of the Goddess lowers Defense and deals BRV damage every turn.

Passives.Wound Light: Slightly reduces Action Delay after using Wound.
Passives.Break Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed for 1 turn after breaking an enemy.
Passives.Debuff Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack while an enemy is debuffed.
Passives.Moonlight Light: Slightly reduces Action Delay after using Moonlight.
Passives.Critical BRV Gain: Grants a small amount of BRV after dealing a critical hit.
Passives.Wound Charge: Increases the max uses of Wound by 1.
Passives.Debuff Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed while an enemy is debuffed.
Passives.Moonlight Charge: Increases the max uses of Moonlight by 1.
Passives.Etro's Miracle: Slightly raises Attack and Speed if HP is Max when the final battle starts.
Passives.Debuff Speed Up II: Slightly raises Speed while an enemy is debuffed.
Passives.Wound Extend: Increases the max uses of Wound by 2.When using Wound:- Moderately raises its total potency.- Turns it to an AoE BRV attack.- Moderately raises BRV damage dealt to a single target.- Slightly improves its Poison and Max BRV Down effect and extends their duration by 2 turns.- Grants Unwavering Will for 5 turns.- Unwavering Will raises self Max BRV and Attack, and raises party's Defense and Speed.- Triggers an HP attack if BRV is over 80% Max BRV.While Unwavering Will is active:- Turns Wound to Wound+.- Increases the number of hits to 2.- Moderately raises its potency.- Triggers an HP attack after use.- Deals 50% HP damage to other enemies.- Raises all allies' BRV based on HP damage dealt.- Turns BRV Attack to BRV Attack+ - BRV Attack+ is a 1-HIT magic BRV attack that raises party's BRV based on Attack.
Passives.Debuff Boost All: Slightly raises party's Max BRV while an enemy is debuffed.
Passives.Moonlight Extend: Increases Moonlight's max uses by 1.When using Moonlight:- Slightly raises the BRV Gain based on Attack.- Slightly raises the BRV multiplier.- After the BRV gains, deals a 1-HIT magic BRV atack.- Slightly improves the Attack Up buff and grants it to all party members.- Extends all granted buffs by 2 turns.- Inflicts Small Attack Down for 5 turns.While Unwavering Will is active:- Turns Moonlight to Moonlight+.- Which turns it to an AoE HP attack.- HP damage is divided equally amongst all enemies.- Moderately raises BRV damage dealt to a single target.- BRV stolen can overflow up to 120% Max BRV.- Raises all allies' BRV based on HP damage dealt.
Passives.Resonance of Destruction and Power: Raises party Max BRV and Attack by 10%
Passives.Advance All Extend: When using  Advance All , adds the following effect:- Slightly raises party Attack

Weapons.Amazon Bow CP: 35: Increases Moonlight's BRV gain, grants it to allies as well and lowers its Action Delay.Increases the potency of Attack Up.Grants all party members Small Max BRV Up for 3 turns.
Weapons.Starseeker CP: 15: Increases the potency of Wound.Increases the potency of Max BRV Down and Poison, and extends their duration.
Weapons.Faerie's Bow CP: 70: May equip the EX Ability Ultima Arrow.
Weapons.Bloom Stone CP: Cannot be equipped: Advance All  use +1Duration of  Advance All  effects +2 turns
